title: Havent received season rewards
body:
Literally 1 day before end of season, I received a 10 game chat ban and got honor level 0. I played the games out. I've never been banned.

I havent received any season rewards. Ive looked around and people said that the honor system does not effect season rewards.
I either have the worst luck possible or something went wrong?

replies.body: Honor system doesn't effect it but having an active chat restriction at the end of season does. [You won't receive the rewards due to this. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility)
So unfair.. I grinded all year to get to where i got to. Then a day before I would've received my reward. I got a restriction.. thats so unbalanced......
I thought if you got honor level 0 means you don't get rewards also you have to get banned or something similar to get below level 2
